sub_title: Consultant Scientific Markets, Global at SRC-Search
summary:
Your most important company asset is your workforce. Work with us to find you the best!

SRC-Search was established in 2012 to offer an unrivalled recruitment experience within the diagnostic, life science, analytical and medical industries across EMEA. Our clients range from start-ups to small-medium enterprises up to global market-leaders looking to fill positions ranging from entry-level to the board-room.

Recruiting the best talent requires the perfect mix of market knowledge and experience within the search and selection process. Our experienced multi-lingual consultants have a deep understanding of your market segment and have built exceptional reputations within them. We have a strong track record of success recruiting for commercial positions and are always on the lookout to partner with innovative companies offering disruptive technologies into the scientific industry. 

Besides quality, knowledge and results, the characteristics that really sets us aside from the competition is the way we deliver our service – day in day out. Genuine love and passion for what we do, the wish to help people and the drive to succeed. 

If you are searching for new team members to join your company, or seeking a new position yourself, call me now on +31641229086 or email me on chad@src-search.com.

www.src-search.com

profile_positions.title: Consultant Scientific Markets, Global

profile_positions.description:
Conduct strategic recruiting to fill open positions within dedicated business function. Provide candidates and external clients (HRM, Line Management) a customer focused and highly effective experience during the hiring process. Sourcing domestically and internationally.

• Support both Business Developers and Account Managers to ensure understanding of organizational talent needs
• Act as primary point-of-contact for HRM and Line Management throughout the recruiting lifecycle 
• Build strategic talent pools on the back of an operational demand management process to meet future hiring requirements.
• Maintain regular and consistent contact with top prospects within talent pipelines, regardless of present position availability.
• Utilize best practice sourcing methods including advanced web sourcing, social networks, niche job boards, user groups, research and databases to source passive candidates meeting the needs of the organization
• Execute recruiting and advertising strategies to identify and attract top candidates 
• Comply with global candidate experience guidelines in order to provide a best-in-class candidate experience
• Input and update candidate information in all relevant talent acquisition systems and tools (e.g., Bullhorn, LinkedIn-Recruitment,) 

KEY RELATIONSHIPS
• Relocation | Contracts | Payroll | People's Management
• Chapter Lead | Business Developers | Account Managers | Delivery Coach
• Relocation Agent | Contract Manager | Payroll
• Department: Software Development & Testing | Infrastructure, Cloud and Security | Data & Engineering & Analytics | Finance, Risk & Compliance, Banking | Products & Generics

Key Expertise:
Candidate Relationship Management | Stakeholder Management | International Recruitment | Coordinating
profile_positions.title: International IT Recruiter

skills: Europe, the Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
